verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Shoshannim Eduth. A Psalm of Asaph. Give ea <S%H238><s%>, O Shepherd <S%H7462><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thou that leadest <S%H5090><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> like a flock <S%H6629><s%>; Thou that sittest <S%H3427><s%> above the cherubim <S%H3742><s%>, shine forth <S%H3313><s%>.
Before <S%H6440><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, stir up <S%H5782><s%> thy might <S%H1369><s%>, And come <S%H3212><s%> to save us <S%H3444><s%>.
Turn us again <S%H7725><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>; And cause thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%>, and we shall be saved <S%H3467><s%>.
O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, How long wilt thou be angry <S%H6225><s%> against the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>?
Thou hast fed <S%H398><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of tears <S%H1832><s%>, And given them tears <S%H1832><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> in large measure <S%H7991><s%>.
Thou makest <S%H7760><s%> us a strife <S%H4066><s%> unto our neighbors <S%H7934><s%>; And our enemies <S%H341><s%> laugh among themselves <S%H3932><s%>.
Turn us again <S%H7725><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; And cause thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%>, and we shall be saved <S%H3467><s%>.
Thou broughtest <S%H5265><s%> a vine <S%H1612><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: Thou didst drive out <S%H1644><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and plantedst it <S%H5193><s%>.
Thou preparedst <S%H6437><s%> room before <S%H6440><s%> it <S%H8328><s%>, And it took deep root <S%H8327><s%>, and filled <S%H4390><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> were covered <S%H3680><s%> with the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of it <S%H6057><s%>, And the boughs thereof were like cedars <S%H730><s%> of God <S%H410><s%>.
It sent out <S%H7971><s%> its branches <S%H3127><s%> unto the sea <S%H3220><s%>, And its shoots <S%H3127><s%> unto the River <S%H5104><s%>.
Why hast thou broken down <S%H6555><s%> its walls <S%H1447><s%>, So that all they that pass <S%H5674><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> do pluck it <S%H717><s%>?
The boar <S%H2386><s%> out of the wood <S%H3293><s%> doth ravage <S%H3765><s%> it <S%H2123><s%>, And the wild beasts of the field <S%H7704><s%> feed on it <S%H7462><s%>.

Turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H430><s%>, we beseech thee, O God of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: Look down <S%H5027><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and behold <S%H7200><s%>, and visit <S%H6485><s%> this vine <S%H1612><s%>,
And the stock <S%H3657><s%> which thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> planted <S%H5193><s%>, And the branch <S%H1121><s%> that thou madest strong for thyself <S%H553><s%>.
It is burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, it is cut down <S%H3683><s%>: They perish <S%H6><s%> at the rebuke <S%H1606><s%> of thy countenance <S%H6440><s%>.
Let thy hand <S%H3027><s%> be upon the man <S%H376><s%> of thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, Upon the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> whom thou madest strong for thyself <S%H553><s%>.
So shall we not go back <S%H5472><s%> from thee <S%H2421><s%>: Quicken thou us <S%H7121><s%>, and we will call upon thy name <S%H8034><s%>.
Turn us again <S%H7725><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Cause thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%>, and we shall be saved <S%H3467><s%>.
